description:
"Plone for News Portals" by: Érico Andrei
 Out-of-the-box Plone is already a good solution for news portals but with some tricks and integrations, it can scale to support a scenario with multiple editors and collaborators.

Recorded at the 2021 Python Web Conference (https://2021.pythonwebconf.com)
title: Plone for News Portals
